author: Jack Gramenz
title: Better mobile coverage for the bush
description: The funding program began in 2015 as a way to improve the communications infrastructure in the bush. Over the resulting four rounds of funding, the government gave money to Telstra, Optus and Vodafone to help meet the costs of building better infrastructure f…
content:
Rural and regional Australians are set to benefit from better mobile reception as the governments Mobile Black Spot program enters its fifth round. The funding program began in 2015 as a way to improve the communications infrastructure in the bush.
Over the … [+4546 chars]
